short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Automatically Endorse all skills to your contacts

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Automatically Endorse all skills to your contacts. 
Steps to follow in  order to work:
- go to   https://www.linkedin.com/in/[CONTACT NAME]/details/skills/
- refresh the page
- the endorsement will happen instantly, you can check the console to check the log status
- at the end, you will receive an  alter box with the  finishing message
